name: visual_editor_test_experiment
description: A comprehensive test experiment for visual editor functionality

variants.name: test-variant
variants.config: {"dom_changes": [{"selector": "#main-title", "type": "text", "value": "Modified Test Page Title", "enabled": true}, {"selector": "#hero-cta", "type": "style", "value": {"backgroundColor": "#dc2626", "color": "white"}, "enabled": true}, {"selector": ".button-primary", "type": "class", "add": ["rounded-lg"], "enabled": true}]}

variants.1: [{"selector": "#main-title", "type": "text", "value": "Modified Test Page Title", "enabled": true}, {"selector": "#hero-cta", "type": "style", "value": {"backgroundColor": "#dc2626", "color": "white"}, "enabled": true}, {"selector": ".button-primary", "type": "class", "add": ["rounded-lg"], "enabled": true}]

variables.name: hero_description
variables.defaultValue: Experience the future of A/B testing

variants.0: Experience the future of A/B testing with our visual editor. Make changes without writing a single line of code.
variants.1: Transform your website with our powerful visual editor. Create experiments in minutes, not hours.
